request.description:
BRD:
Dashboard User (Techserve4u/Company admin) login in
admin panel

Objective:
As a company admin, I want to login to the
admin panel so that I can avail of services available
according to my member type

SE: Shiblu Ahmad
PO: Pranto Majumder
QA: Samsur Rahman Rajib
Reviewer: Pranto Majumder.

Acceptance Criteria:
I will get my login credentials from my super admin.
If I want to login as a techserve4u admin then I have to
register on techserve4u panel or if I want to login as a
company admin then I have to register on the
company panel.

Dependency: 
Register Dashboard User should be able to log in to the
admin panel.

Method: Post
Body:
{
    "email": "rajib@gmail.com",
    "password": "Rajib1234"

}
Expected Result:
{
    "auth_token": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJleHAiOjE2MDM5ODQwOTMsImlhdCI6MTYwMzk4MDQ5Mywic3ViIjo1NDUsInVzZXJfdHlwZSI6IkRhc2hib2FyZCIsIm5hbWUiOiJmaXJzdCBsYXN0dXNlciIsImVtYWlsIjoicmFqaWJfOTk5QHlhaG9vLmNvbSIsIm1lbWJlcl90eXBlIjoyLCJjb21wYW55X2lkIjo0MDcsImRlc2lnbmF0aW9uIjpudWxsLCJkZXBhcnRtZW50IjpudWxsfQ.OAIbMnWjnq0HZCqXW_gIWPY8tu0S_H1Irh7u_aTXbSU",
    "message": "Successfully logged in.",
    "status": "success"
}
Actual Result: 
{
    "auth_token": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJleHAiOjE2MDM5ODQwOTMsImlhdCI6MTYwMzk4MDQ5Mywic3ViIjo1NDUsInVzZXJfdHlwZSI6IkRhc2hib2FyZCIsIm5hbWUiOiJmaXJzdCBsYXN0dXNlciIsImVtYWlsIjoicmFqaWJfOTk5QHlhaG9vLmNvbSIsIm1lbWJlcl90eXBlIjoyLCJjb21wYW55X2lkIjo0MDcsImRlc2lnbmF0aW9uIjpudWxsLCJkZXBhcnRtZW50IjpudWxsfQ.OAIbMnWjnq0HZCqXW_gIWPY8tu0S_H1Irh7u_aTXbSU",

request.description:
Objective:
As an App user, I want to login to the FFM
app so that I can avail services available to me

Acceptance Criteria:
I should be able to login on the FFM mobile app through
my registered contact number.
I will get an OTP code to verify my number.

Dependency: 
Users should be registered from the company admin
panel.  

Body:
{
    "phone_number": "5857086014",
    "firebase_id": "firebase_ididid",
    "secret_text": "the_super_secret_text",
    "phone_number_int": "5857086014",
    "iso_code": "US"
}

}

item.name: TFS_22_App user should be able to view the task list

exec: pm.test("Response time is less than 600ms", function () {
"description": "The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.",
"description": "An explanation about the purpose of this instance.",
"description": "An explanation about the purpose of this instance.",
"description": "An explanation about the purpose of this instance.",

request.description:
Objective: As an app user, I want to see the assigned task list so that I can complete the task and can see also incomplete/complete tasks.

Acceptance Criteria:  
I can see the assigned task with details.
After completing the task I can give updates through the FFM app.
The company admin should be able to see the update of my action items. 

Dependencies: 
Registered users should be login to the FFM app.
Company admin should create users before assigning them.


Steps: 
Open postman
Open Folder (Field Force Management)
Open a new tab 
Add API URL
Select method: GET
Select the Authorization tab
Select type: Bearer Token
Paste the token: ("user login" API)
Hit the "Send" button to execute the API

API Specification: 
API URL:  /api/v1/field-force/task/user-get-tasks/{user_id}
Method: GET

(Note: For user_id as a registered user you need to login through "user login" API then authenticate the user through "authenticate user" API)

Expected Result:
{
    "message": [
        {
            "admin_id": 752,
            "album_id": 211,

App user should be able to upload delivery image

Objective: As an app user, I want to upload an image against the completed task so that I can assure the company admin that this delivery is completed successfully.

Acceptance Criteria: 
I should be able to take a picture of the invoice or the surrounding place of the task where I complete it.
After uploading the image I can complete the task action item and update it on the FFM app.
Dependency:
App users should be able to log in to the FFM through valid credentials.

For input payload,
body-->form-data and select key=File and name it "photo"
value="select files" from computer

    "status": "success"
}
